messages.message: Hello. We have a very common request to isolate the last page of a document, usually to look for signatures, names or dates. Is it possible to isolate them in the settings of the project? Perhaps asking for a page range like -1 (for the last page), or -2, for the last 2 pages. Thanks.
we donâ€™t currently support this, right? so this would be a new feature request? @Rakesh
Correct, would be good to get a new EPD ticket / feature request for this.

I went ahead and created a basic ticket for this, but anyone please feel free to edit as you see fit.

@fernando.piazza.ctr it was recently discussed in a Field to EPD feedback call that it's important to list affected customers in tickets like this, so they can gauge the prioritization against the impact.  Mind saying which customer(s) are asking for this?
